ygData.subject: Re: High Hold Pass
ygData.msgSnippet: Basically.  It looks that way from what I can see of the map.  Anyway, just in case its off, here are brief directions. After entering from Kithicor, stick to
ygData.messageBody:
Basically. It looks that way from what I can see of the map. Anyway,
just in case its off, here are brief directions.

After entering from Kithicor, stick to the main path. Now, when you get
to a bridge, DO NOT CROSS. The path continues if you look to the right.
Eventually you will reach a Y. You can see buildings to the right, you
want to go left into the mines. Cross through and you should come out
in front of the keep. In the mines, if I remember right, do not go
through the square opening, go the other way.

This pretty much goes with what I see on the map. Stay invised, do not
cross the bridge, and stay away from orcs and gnolls. Its not that hard
to do.

-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 10:31 AM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: High Hold Pass


From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

So, I get to the keep by going through the guard house?

Qinie, 8th Circle Enchantress
Mithaniel Marr server

---------------------------------------

> The bank is in the keep itself, which is another zone entirely.
Inside
> the keep is safe (unless your a dark elf) EXCEPT for the basement.
> Coincidently, the bank is in the basement, and is as far as I would go
> as all the hostiles conned red to me at 16.
>
>
>
